alert.note: Alert for Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 11:10PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ROSS COUNTY THROUGH 1145 PM EST... At 1110 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located over Cynthiana, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Greenfield, Kingston, Bainbridge, North Folk Village, Frankfort, Laurelville, Adelphi, South Salem, Bourneville, Andersonville, Mooresville, Lattaville, Summithill, Knockemstiff, Massieville and Hallsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
